document_data.mainbody:
erondarg DelArmgo was a drow and one of the most able scouts of House Barrison DelArmgo in Menzoberranzan in the late 15 century DR.
In the , following his houses attack against the resurrected House DoUrden, Terondarg conducted a scouting mission. He later made a report to the matron mother MezBarris Armgo and high priestess Taayrul Armgo, using Drow Sign Language concealed by his cloak for privacy.
